name: Romantra Perfume cologne Spray Jasmine
description: Emit the radiance from within and exude  undeniable star quality. This powerfully  captivating premium Parfum radiates a bright  fruity/floral bouquet that blooms with a  mesmerizing trail. The scent is destined to leave  an unforgettable star impression and make heads turn when you pass by.*Images for illustration purpose only, Product received may vary.
